mapper.select: select np.id,np.city_name cityName,np.resource, np.net_type netType,ch.channel,np.price,np.low_consume lowConsume,n.num_level numLevel,ifnull(a.commpay_name,'默认') commpayName,DATE_FORMAT(np.add_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') addDate from tb_num_price np inner join tb_num n on np.num_id = n.id left join tb_channel ch on np.channel=ch.channel_id left join tb_agent a on a.id= np.agent_id and a.status=2 and a.is_del=0 where np.is_del=0 and ch.is_del=0 and n.status = 2 and np.channel = #{param.channel} and np.resource like "%"#{param.resource}"%" and (np.agent_id = -1 or np.agent_id = #{param.agentId}) order by np.id
mapper.update: update tb_num_price p set p.feature = REPLACE(p.feature,#{feature},',') where p.is_del = 0 and p.feature REGEXP ".*"#{feature}".*";
update tb_num n set n.is_freeze = #{param.isFreeze} where n.id=#{param.id}
mapper.select: select a.price ,ifnull(b.price,a.price) agentPrice from (select np.price,np.resource from tb_num_price np where np.resource=#{param.resource} and np.agent_id=-1 and np.is_del=0 and np.channel=#{param.channel}) a left join (select np.price,np.resource from tb_num_price np where np.resource=#{param.resource} and np.agent_id=#{param.agentId} and np.is_del=0 and np.channel=#{param.channel}) b on a.resource=b.resource
select count(1) from tb_num_price np where np.resource=#{resource} and np.is_del=0 and np.channel=#{param.channel} and (np.agent_id=-1 or np.agent_id=#{param.agentId})
